meanings.sent1: The expurgatory book helped remove inappropriate content.
meanings.sent2: Her expurgatory actions purified the polluted river.
meanings.sent3: The expurgatory sponge magically cleaned the stained dishes.
meanings.sent4: His expurgatory touch erased all traces of graffiti from the wall.
meanings.sent5: The expurgatory soap made the dirty clothes spotless.

meanings.sent1: The expurgatory detergent made the clothes smell fresh.
meanings.sent2: His expurgatory behavior always aimed to cleanse misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The expurgatory vacuum sucked up all the dust bunnies with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her expurgatory words purified the toxic atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The expurgatory filter ensured only clean water came out of the tap.

meanings.sent1: The expurgatory committee reviewed the movie for inappropriate scenes.
meanings.sent2: The expurgatory laws restricted certain words from being used in public.
meanings.sent3: The expurgatory ruler only allowed books with approved content.
meanings.sent4: The expurgatory decision to ban the book caused controversy.
meanings.sent5: The expurgatory process of editing removed sensitive information from the document.
